sqlReaderQuery.value: @variables('SQLString')

SELECT [WATERMARK] AS [WATERMARK_DELTA]
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_TABLES] where DATABASE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}' AND TABLE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}'

SELECT 
COLUMN_NAME

  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_COLUMNS] WHERE 
  TABLE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' AND WATERMARK_COLUMN=1

SELECT 
MAX(@{activity('Get Watermark Column_Delta').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME}) as MAXWATERMARK FROM 
[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_SchemaName}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]

value.value:
SELECT  @{activity('Get Watermark Column_Delta').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME},
@{variables('ColumnString')} FROM 
dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]
WHERE [@{activity('Get Watermark Column_Delta').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME}]> '@{variables('Watermark_Value_Delta')}'
AND [@{activity('Get Watermark Column_Delta').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME}]<='@{variables('Max_Watermark')}'

sqlReaderQuery.value: @variables('SQLString')

@if(
    equals(activity('Get Watermark Column').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME, ''),'SELECT ''1900/01/01'' WATERMARK_NEW',
    concat(
        'SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN ',
        activity('Get Watermark Column').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME,
        ' = ''1900/01/01'' THEN ''1900/01/01'' ELSE ',
        activity('Get Watermark Column').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME,
        ' END) AS WATERMARK_NEW FROM dbo.[',
        pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName,
        ']'
    )
)

SELECT ISNULL(
    (SELECT TOP 1 COLUMN_NAME 
    FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_COLUMNS] 
    WHERE TABLE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' 
    AND WATERMARK_COLUMN = 1), 
    '') AS COLUMN_NAME

SELECT STUFF(
    (SELECT ', ' + [COLUMN_NAME]
    FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_COLUMNS]
    WHERE [TABLE_NAME] = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' 
    AND [ACTIVE] = 1
    AND [WATERMARK_COLUMN] <> 1
    FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS COLUMN_NAMES

SELECT 
convert(bigint, @{activity('Get Watermark Column_Delta').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME} ) as VersionNumber,
@{variables('ColumnString')} FROM 
dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]
WHERE 
convert(bigint,"@{activity('Get Watermark Column_Delta').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME}")> @{variables('Watermark_Value_Delta')}
AND 
convert(bigint,"@{activity('Get Watermark Column_Delta').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME}")<= @{variables('Max_Watermark')}

SELECT COALESCE([WATERMARK],0) AS [WATERMARK_DELTA]
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_TABLES] where DATABASE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}' AND TABLE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}'

SELECT 
COLUMN_NAME

  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_COLUMNS] WHERE 
  TABLE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' AND WATERMARK_COLUMN=1

SELECT 
MAX(convert(bigint, @{activity('Get Watermark Column_Delta').output.firstRow.COLUMN_NAME})) as MAXWATERMARK FROM 
[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_SchemaName}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]
@variables('ColumnString')

SELECT ISNULL(
    (SELECT TOP 1 COLUMN_NAME 
    FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_COLUMNS] 
    WHERE TABLE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' 
    AND WATERMARK_COLUMN = 1), 
    '') AS COLUMN_NAME

SELECT STUFF(
    (SELECT ', ' + [COLUMN_NAME]
    FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_COLUMNS]
    WHERE [TABLE_NAME] = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' 
    AND [ACTIVE] = 1
    AND [WATERMARK_COLUMN] <> 1
    FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS COLUMN_NAMES

Select * FROM [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]
where [Sys_RowNumber] > @{variables('v_Watermark')}

SELECT [WATERMARK]
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL03_TABLES]
  where TABLE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}'
  and DATABASE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}'

Select max([Sys_RowNumber]) as NewWatermark FROM [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]
where Sys_RowNumber > @{variables('v_Watermark')}

Select * FROM  [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]
where [Sys_RowNumber] <= '@{variables('v_NewWatermark')}'
Select max([Sys_RowNumber]) as NewWatermark FROM [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]

text.value:
create view [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]
as

SELECT 
cast([timestamp] as bigint)as [Sys_RowNumber],
@{concat(join(variables('ColumnString'),',' ) )} FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL03_COLUMNS]
WHERE [TABLE_NAME] = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}'
AND [ACTIVE] =1

text.value:
if object_id('[edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}', 'V') 
is not null drop view [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select DISTINCT @{join(pipeline().parameters.pm_BuinessKeys,',')} FROM [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]
@activity('GetSelectionString').output.firstRow.SelectionString

DECLARE @@s VARCHAR(MAX) 

DECLARE @@tablename VARCHAR(500) ='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' 
DECLARE @@schemaname VARCHAR(500) ='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_SchemaName}' 

 

SELECT @@s = ISNULL(@@s+', ','') + '[' + c.name + ']' + ' as ['+replace(replace(replace(c.name,' ',''),'(',''),')','') +'] ' 

FROM sys.all_columns c, sys.tables t, sys.schemas s

where c.object_id = t.object_id 
and t.schema_id  = s.schema_id

 

SELECT 'select ' + @@s + ' from ' + @@tablename as SelectionString

SELECT * FROM [adf].[CT_TAG02_COLUMNS]
WHERE [TABLE_NAME] = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}'
AND [ACTIVE] =1

text.value:
if object_id('[edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].@{replace(replace(replace(replace(join(split(pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName,' '),''),'_',''),'-',''),'(',''),')','')}', 'V') 
is not null drop view [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{replace(replace(replace(replace(join(split(pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName,' '),''),'_',''),'-',''),'(',''),')','')}]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL03_DATABASES]
  where Active = 1

SELECT *
  FROM [adf].[CT_NUAZ-SQLSERVER-01_DATABASES]
  where Active = 1
